name: ai_accessibility_companion
title: AccessAI: Real-time Accessibility Companion for the Visually Impaired
problem: Visually impaired individuals struggle to navigate unfamiliar environments and read text in real-world settings
solution: A mobile app using computer vision and LLMs to describe surroundings, read text, and provide navigation assistance in real-time
unique_angle: Combines scene understanding with conversational AI for natural interaction
demo_potential: Live demo walking through a room, reading signs, identifying objects

name: carbon_footprint_tracker
title: CarbonLens: AI-Powered Personal Carbon Footprint Analyzer
problem: People want to reduce their carbon footprint but don't know which daily choices have the biggest impact
solution: An app that analyzes receipts, travel patterns, and purchases to calculate and visualize carbon impact with actionable suggestions
unique_angle: Uses receipt scanning and bank transaction analysis for accurate tracking without manual input
demo_potential: Scan a grocery receipt and instantly see carbon impact breakdown

name: mental_health_journaling
title: MindMirror: AI Therapy Companion with Sentiment Analysis
problem: Many people can't afford therapy but need mental health support and self-reflection tools
solution: A journaling app with AI that provides CBT-based prompts, tracks mood patterns, and offers personalized coping strategies
unique_angle: Combines journaling with evidence-based CBT techniques and long-term mood tracking
demo_potential: Show mood trends over time and AI-generated insights from journal entries
